about_the_game:
Fight Battles


Experience classic turn based RPG combat with real time elements such as turn timers and active abilities. Your enemies will attack you quickly without stopping. You must be ready not only to input your next orders, but also to block enemy attacks and enhance your own magic. This provides a fun, fast-paced way to control an entire party, where each member brings their own unique abilities to the table.

Explore a Procedural World


Each new game creates a new world for you to explore with randomized treasures, zone layouts, monster stats, and world map. This lets you build up your power in a different way giving you a new experience each time you play.

Get Cool Treasure


Collect lots of loot and treasure scattered throughout each zone. Enjoy both statistical and cosmetic progression of your characters as well as entire new abilities.

Steal items and complete quests for truly powerful items that will make your enemies crumble. Equipment doesn't just change statistics, some will give you new skills and alter how you play.

Short Play Time


Each playthrough is only a few hours, so you won't have to dedicate a huge amount of time to feel progression. Start a new file and play between the other more epic-length games in your library.

Couch Co-Op


The game can be played 1-4 players using controllers.

Open Source


This game is open source and is built on the Anomalous Engine. You can check out the code on GitHub. This game has a unique 2d/3d Ray Traced renderer that works well on the Steam Deck and other devices with integrated graphics that support ray tracing.

Check Out the Full Version


Since the game is open source this demo has all of the content. Buying the full version will get you achievements and supports the development of new games.

Important Technical Notes


This game requires Ray Tracing compatible hardware to function.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has cartoon blood and violence between the player characters and the monsters they fight. These elements are exaggerated as part of the game play feedback to the player.

  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2000 or higher, AMD Radeon 6000 or higher, Intel ARC Alchemist or higher

short_description: Slay monsters and explore procedural worlds in this old school hack and slash Mini-RPG set in a fantasy world. Battles are a combo of turn based and real time elements. Block enemy attacks and enhance your own using active abilities.
